instruction: Create a job advertisement for the position of a project manager.
output: We are looking for a competent Project Manager to plan, launch and oversee projects from start to finish. You will be entrusted with leading project delivery teams of 5-10 members and ensuring that projects are completed in a timely fashion, within budget and with quality meeting client expectations. To be successful in this role, you should possess specialized skills in project management and software development. You should have excellent organizational and communication skills and be able to motivate and lead the team through to project completion. #Jobs #ProjectManagement
